item.title: Everything you need to know about Tmux copy paste
item.description: Copying from a Tmux session is something every Tmux user struggled with once. I'm listing out all the stuff I learnt in this blog. I tested everything on Mac OS X El Capitan. For Ubuntu/Linux guide, see here. Mac OS X El Capitan runs Tmux version 2.1. To check your Tmux version, run tmux -V. Know about your terminal The default terminal which comes with Mac is pretty limiting. Instead of listing the limitations (and workarounds around it), I'll just say that before you proceed, please install iTerm 2 and start using that immediately.
